ThingDef.label: prefab heater
ThingDef.description: A device that converts electricity into heat, more effectively than basic heater. It can automatically turn itself on or off to reach a specific target temperature.

ThingDef.label: prefab standing lamp
ThingDef.description: An electrical prefab standing lamp that lights an area in mild blue. People need light to move and work at full speed.

ThingDef.label: prefab dresser
ThingDef.description: A simple dresser designed to be quickly and easily assembled in the process of setting up a new colony. Gives a non-stacking comfort bonus to nearby beds.

ThingDef.label: prefab chair
ThingDef.description: A simple and comfortable armchair designed to be quickly and easily assembled in the process of setting up a new colony.

ThingDef.label: prefab bed
ThingDef.description: A comfortable bed designed to be quickly and easily assembled in the process of setting up a new colony.

ThingDef.label: prefab double bed
ThingDef.description: A comfortable double bed designed to be quickly and easily assembled in the process of setting up a new colony.

ThingDef.label: prefab cooler
ThingDef.description: A prefab air-cooling machine that fits into a wall. Cool air comes out one side, while hot exhaust comes out the other. Can be used to cool down rooms during summer, or to create a walk-in freezer.

ThingDef.label: prefab vent
ThingDef.description: A way of conducting temperature from one room to another. Originally designed for starship airlocks, this vent is powered allowing for much faster temperature equalization.\n\nPrefabricated equipment is vital for getting a new settlement up and running quickly and safely out on the dangerous frontier.

ThingDef.label: prefab shelf
ThingDef.description: A shelf to keep items from deteriorating.\n\nPrefabricated equipment is vital for getting a new settlement up and running quickly and safely out on the dangerous frontier.

ThingDef.label: prefab end table
ThingDef.description: A handy little table to keep your drink on when you're watching a holo, it doesn't take up too much space.\n\nPrefabricated equipment is vital for getting a new settlement up and running quickly and safely out on the dangerous frontier.

ThingDef.label: prefab end table with lamp
ThingDef.description: A small table to keep your drink on when you're watching reading files by the light of the included lamp. \n\nPrefabricated equipment is vital for getting a new settlement up and running quickly and safely out on the dangerous frontier.

ThingDef.label: prefab medical bed
ThingDef.description: An advanced medical bed used for patients, either combat wounded or otherwise sick, with a multitude of functions that provides state-of-the-art constant medical care. From medi-gel administrations, to complete and thorough scans of a patients vital functions. \n\nPrefabricated equipment is vital for getting a new settlement up and running quickly and safely out on the dangerous frontier.

ThingDef.label: prefab armchair
ThingDef.description: A stylish prefabricated armchair, it's well stuffed and comfortable to sit in for most races. \n\nPrefabricated equipment is vital for getting a new settlement up and running quickly and safely out on the dangerous frontier.

ThingDef.label: prefab bedside table
ThingDef.description: A handy little table to keep your beer on when you're watching a holo, it doesn't take up too much space. \n\nPrefabricated equipment is vital for getting a new settlement up and running quickly and safely out on the dangerous frontier.

ThingDef.label: prefab bedside table with lamp
ThingDef.description: A small table to keep your drink on when you're watching reading files by the light of the included lamp. \n\nPrefabricated equipment is vital for getting a new settlement up and running quickly and safely out on the dangerous frontier.

ThingDef.label: briefing table
ThingDef.description: A large table with a glass center designed for the purpose of discussing strategical and tactical decisions, or for other necessary functions, such as eating or crew entertainment, which requires chairs to be placed facing the table. Big enough to get an entire colony around for important meetings and social gatherings.

ThingDef.label: prefab stool
ThingDef.description: A simple seat. Can be placed at tables to allow your colonists to eat there, in front of TVs so they can watch, or in front of production benches to provide a comfort boost while they work. \n\nPrefabricated equipment is vital for getting a new settlement up and running quickly and safely out on the dangerous frontier.

ThingDef.label: prefab wardrobe
ThingDef.description: A wardrobe that offers an increase comfort bonus to all nearby beds, it can hold almost any kind of clothing, from bomber-jackets to officially Alliance licensed N7 hoodies. \n\nPrefabricated equipment is vital for getting a new settlement up and running quickly and safely out on the dangerous frontier.

ThingDef.label: prefab plant pot
ThingDef.description: A simple plant pot for housing decorative flowers, which improves the mood of people nearby.

ThingDef.label: prefab large plant pot
ThingDef.description: An aesthetically pleasing plant pot for housing decorative flowers, which improves the mood of people nearby.

ThingDef.Name: RE_PrefabTableBase
ThingDef.description: People eat off tables when chairs are placed facing them.
